Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_glacier_high WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ORDER BY area DESC ) AS area_glacier_high
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_farmland WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_farmland
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_industrial WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_industrial
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_construction WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_construction
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_living WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_living
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_forest WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_forest
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_rocks WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_rocks
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_beach WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_beach
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_shopping WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_shopping
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_education WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_education
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_parking WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_parking
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_airport WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_airport
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_tourism WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_tourism
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_harbour WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_harbour
(SELECT id, geom, name FROM area_greenfield WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_greenfields
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_cemetery WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_cemetery

(SELECT round(ele* 3.2808399) AS ele, wkb_geometry, fid, CASE WHEN (ele % 100::numeric) = 0::numeric THEN 100 WHEN (ele % 50::numeric) = 0::numeric THEN 50 ELSE 10 END AS group from contour.world_contour_lines WHERE ele != 0 AND length_ngmaps(wkb_geometry) > 500 AND (((ele % 50::numeric) = 0::numeric ) or ((ele % 100::numeric) = 0::numeric ) or ((ele % 200::numeric) = 0::numeric))) AS contour
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_water WHERE type NOT IN ('marina') AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_water_high
(SELECT * FROM area_reef WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS reef
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_city_railway WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_city_railway
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_emergency_firedepartment WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_emergency_firedepartment
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_emergency_hospital WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_emergency_hospital
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_emergency_policestation WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_emergency_policestation
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM area_building WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_buildings
(SELECT id, geom, type, area_ngmaps(geom) AS area FROM area_military WHERE area > 1000000 AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_military
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM line_waterway WHERE type NOT IN ('stream','drain') AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS line_waterway
(SELECT id, geom, type, (area/(!pixel_width!+1*!pixel_height!+1)) AS way_pixels FROM area_wateroverlay WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS area_water_overlay
(SELECT * FROM area_naturalreserve WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS naturalreserve
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM line_cliff WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS line_cliff
(SELECT * FROM line_roads_big WHERE (tunnel='yes' OR tunnel IS NOT NULL) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS big_roads_tunnel
(SELECT * FROM line_rail WHERE tunnel = 'yes' AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 AND type = 'long_distance') AS line_rail
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM line_ferry WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS line_ferry

(SELECT * FROM line_roads_big WHERE (tunnel != 'yes' OR tunnel IS NULL) AND (bridge !='yes' OR bridge IS NULL) AND (type IN ('tertiary','tertiary_link','unclassified')) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ORDER BY prio DESC) AS line_roads_B

(SELECT * FROM line_roads_big WHERE (tunnel !='yes' OR tunnel IS NULL) AND (bridge !='yes' OR bridge IS NULL) AND (type NOT IN ('tertiary','tertiary_link','unclassified')) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ORDER BY prio DESC) AS line_roads_A
(SELECT * FROM line_rail WHERE (bridge = 'yes' OR (bridge IS NULL AND tunnel IS NULL)) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 AND type = 'long_distance') AS line_rail
(SELECT * FROM line_roads_big WHERE (bridge='yes' OR bridge IS NOT NULL) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS big_roads_bridge
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM line_airport WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS line_airport
(SELECT * FROM area_marina WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS marina
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM line_aerialway WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS line_aerialway
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM line_boundaries WHERE type IN ('2', '3', '4') and id not in (137031335, 137195577,136931079) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ) AS line_boundaries
(SELECT * FROM point_airport WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS point_airport

TextSymbolizer.placements: NE, SE, E, N, S, NW, SW, W

NE, SE, E, N, S, NW, SW, W
NE, SE, E, N, S, NW, SW, W
NE, SE, E, N, S, NW, SW, W

Datasource.Parameter:
(SELECT osm_id AS id, way, CASE WHEN place='country' THEN 1 WHEN capital='yes' THEN 10 WHEN place='state' THEN 20 WHEN place='city' THEN 21 WHEN place='town' THEN 30 WHEN place='village' THEN 40 ELSE 100 END as prio, place AS type, CASE WHEN capital='yes' THEN 'country' ELSE NULL END AS is_capital,
CASE WHEN left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),2) = upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),2)) THEN concat( upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),1)) , lower(substring(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)), 2,length(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) ))) ELSE optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)) END AS name_en,
CASE WHEN left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref')),2) = upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref')),2)) THEN concat( upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref')),1)) , lower(substring(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref')), 2,length(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref'))) ))) ELSE optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref')) END AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),2) = upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),2)) THEN (CASE WHEN optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) != optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)) AND optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name)) NOT LIKE concat('%',optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)),'%') AND optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)) NOT LIKE concat('%', optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)),'%') THEN concat( upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),1)) , lower(substring(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)), 2,length(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) ))) || E'\n' || concat( upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref)),1)) , lower(substring(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref)), 2,length(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref))) ))) WHEN optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) != optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)) AND optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)) LIKE concat('%', optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)),'%') THEN concat( upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref)),1)) , lower(substring(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref)), 2,length(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref))) ))) ELSE concat( upper(left(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)),1)) , lower(substring(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref)), 2,length(optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) )))END) ELSE (CASE WHEN optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) != optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)) AND optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name)) NOT LIKE concat('%',optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)),'%') AND optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)) NOT LIKE concat('%', optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)),'%') THEN optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name, ref)) || E'\n' || optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref)) WHEN optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) != optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)) AND optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name)) LIKE concat('%', optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)),'%') THEN optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,ref)) ELSE optimizename(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))END) END AS name_bil,
CASE WHEN isnumeric(planet_osm_point.population) THEN REPLACE(planet_osm_point.population, ',', '.')::numeric ELSE '0':: numeric END AS population FROM planet_osm_point WHERE place in ('country', 'state', 'city', 'town') AND name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY prio, ( CASE WHEN isnumeric(planet_osm_point.population) THEN replace(planet_osm_point.population, ','::text, ''::text)::numeric ELSE '0'::numeric END ) ASC) AS label_places
( SELECT id, geom, type, ref, reflen FROM line_roads_big_label WHERE type IN ('motorway','trunk','primary','secondary') AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ) AS line_big_roads_label

( SELECT DISTINCT ON (icao_code) * from (SELECT osm_id AS id, ST_Centroid(way) as way, aeroway AS type, CASE WHEN length(tags -> 'icao') < 12 THEN tags -> 'icao' ELSE NULL END AS icao_code,
optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) AS name_en, optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref'))) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))) != optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name))) NOT LIKE concat('%',optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))),'%') AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name))) NOT LIKE concat('%', optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))),'%') THEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name, ref))) || E'\n' || optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref))) WHEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))) != optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) LIKE concat('%', optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name))),'%') THEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,ref))) ELSE optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) END AS name_bil
FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE aeroway IN ('aerodrome') AND (planet_osm_polygon.name IS NOT NULL OR (tags ->'icao') IS NOT NULL)
UNION
SELECT osm_id AS id, way, aeroway AS type, CASE WHEN length(tags -> 'icao') < 12 THEN tags -> 'icao' ELSE NULL END AS icao_code,
optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) AS name_en, optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref'))) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))) != optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name))) NOT LIKE concat('%',optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))),'%') AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name))) NOT LIKE concat('%', optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))),'%') THEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name, ref))) || E'\n' || optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref))) WHEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))) != optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) LIKE concat('%', optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name))),'%') THEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,ref))) ELSE optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) END AS name_bil
FROM planet_osm_point WHERE aeroway IN ('aerodrome') AND (planet_osm_point.name IS NOT NULL OR (tags ->'icao') IS NOT NULL)) as a WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS label_airport
(SELECT * FROM point_harbour_high WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS point_harbour
(SELECT * FROM point_tower_high WHERE type IN ('communication_mast','lighthouse','offshore_platform') AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS point_tower
(SELECT * FROM point_helipad WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS point_helipad
(SELECT id, geom, type FROM point_aerialway WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS point_aerialway
(SELECT * FROM point_peak WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ORDER BY height_feet DESC LIMIT 150000) AS point_peak
(SELECT * FROM point_volcano WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS point_volcano

( SELECT planet_osm_polygon.osm_id AS id, planet_osm_polygon.way, area_ngmaps(planet_osm_polygon.way) AS area,
optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) AS name_en, optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,'ref'))) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))) != optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name))) NOT LIKE concat('%',optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))),'%') AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name))) NOT LIKE concat('%', optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))),'%') THEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name, ref))) || E'\n' || optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name, ref))) WHEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name))) != optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) AND optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de', name))) LIKE concat('%', optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name))),'%') THEN optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:de',name,ref))) ELSE optimizename(streetnames(coalesce(tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name,ref))) END AS name_bil
FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE (planet_osm_polygon.landuse = 'forest'::text AND planet_osm_polygon.name IS NOT NULL) AND area_ngmaps(planet_osm_polygon.way) > 3000000 AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS forest_label

(SELECT osm_id AS id, way, waterway AS type,
optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)) AS name_en, optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de', name)) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') AND coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:de',name),'%') THEN optimizename((coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) || E'\n' || coalesce (tags->'name:de',name))) WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') THEN optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de',name)) ELSE optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) END AS name_bil
FROM planet_osm_line WHERE (waterway IN ('river', 'canal') AND name IS NOT NULL) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0) AS label_river

(SELECT osm_id AS id, way, admin_level, boundary,
optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)) AS name_en, optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de', name)) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') AND coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:de',name),'%') THEN optimizename((coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) || E'\n' || coalesce (tags->'name:de',name))) WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') THEN optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de',name)) ELSE optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) END AS name_bil
FROM planet_osm_line WHERE (admin_level IN ('2', '3', '4') AND boundary IN ('administrative') AND name IS NOT NULL) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ORDER BY admin_level) AS label_admin

( SELECT planet_osm_polygon.osm_id AS id, planet_osm_polygon.way ,
optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)) AS name_en, optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de', name)) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') AND coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:de',name),'%') THEN optimizename((coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) || E'\n' || coalesce (tags->'name:de',name))) WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') THEN optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de',name)) ELSE optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) END AS name_bil,
COALESCE(planet_osm_polygon.natural, planet_osm_polygon.place) AS type, area_ngmaps(planet_osm_polygon.way) AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE ((planet_osm_polygon."natural" = ANY (ARRAY['water'::text, 'lake'::text])) OR (planet_osm_polygon.waterway = ANY (ARRAY['basin'::text, 'dam'::text])) OR (planet_osm_polygon.landuse = ANY (ARRAY['reservoir'::text, 'salt_pond'::text])) OR planet_osm_polygon.water IS NOT NULL AND planet_osm_polygon.name IS NOT NULL) AND area_ngmaps(planet_osm_polygon.way) > 300000 AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ) AS water_label

(SELECT osm_id AS id, way , COALESCE (boundary, leisure, landuse) as type, area_ngmaps(planet_osm_polygon.way) AS area, optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en', tags->'int_name', name)) AS name_en, optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de', name)) AS name_nat,
CASE WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') AND coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) NOT LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:de',name),'%') THEN optimizename((coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) || E'\n' || coalesce (tags->'name:de',name))) WHEN coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name) != coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) AND coalesce (tags->'name:de',name) LIKE concat('%', coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name),'%') THEN optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:de',name)) ELSE optimizename(coalesce (tags->'name:en',tags->'int_name', name)) END AS name_bil
FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE ((leisure IN ('nature_reserve') OR boundary IN ('national_park', 'protected_area', 'nature_reserve') OR landuse IN ('nature_reserve')) AND building IS NULL AND name IS NOT NULL AND area_ngmaps(planet_osm_polygon.way) >= 5000000 ) AND z(!scale_denominator!) > 0 ORDER BY area) AS naturalreserve_label_low

(SELECT round(ele* 3.2808399) AS ele, wkb_geometry, fid, CASE WHEN (ele % 100::numeric) = 0::numeric THEN 100 WHEN (ele % 50::numeric) = 0::numeric THEN 50 ELSE 10 END AS group from contour.world_contour_lines WHERE ele != 0 AND length_ngmaps(wkb_geometry) > 500 AND (((ele % 50::numeric) = 0::numeric ) or ((ele % 100::numeric) = 0::numeric ) or ((ele % 200::numeric) = 0::numeric))) AS contour
